input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='o.r.e Men's JWA UNIQLO Wide Fit Chino Pants'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Chino Pants'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Olive Green Chino Pants'
  - Name='Faherty | Movement 5-Pocket Pant (30" Inseam) | Size: 35'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Stretch Terry Athletic Fit Pants'
  - Name='Faherty | Comfort Twill 5-Pocket | Size: 35'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Movement Linen 5-Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Faherty | Original Comfort Twill 5 | Size: 36'
  - Name='Faherty | Coastline Stretch Chino | Size: 30'
  - Name='Faherty | Movement Chino Pant (32" Inseam) | Size: 30'
  - Name='Faherty | Coastline Stretch Chino (32" Inseam) | Size: 36'
  - Name='Faherty | Movement Chino Pant (30" Inseam) | Size: 29'
  - Name='Faherty | Movement Chino Pant (30" Inseam) | Size: 31'
  - Name='Faherty | Movement Chino Pant (32" Inseam) | Size: 36'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Stretch Terry 5-Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Faherty | Movement 5-Pocket Pant (30" Inseam) | Size: 36'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: o.r.e Men's JWA UNIQLO Wide Fit Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are chino pants like the reference, but with a wide fit rather than a tailored tapered fit, suggesting some difference in silhouette and possibly material.
Basic chino pants from a major brand likely share similar construction and purpose with the reference, though fit details are not specified which may reduce exact match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Uniqlo Men's Olive Green Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above Uniqlo chinos, essentially same product type, color not relevant; likely similar fit and construction.
These pants are 5-pocket style which leans toward casual chinos but 'movement' and athletic naming may imply stretch or different fabric, slightly less traditional chino.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Stretch Terry Athletic Fit Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic fit and terry fabric indicate performance/lounge wear rather than traditional chino pants, diverging in construction and silhouette.
Comfort Twill with 5-pocket design aligns closely with traditional chinos and the reference's emphasis on all-purpose use and durable materials.
Linen fabric differs from cotton twill chinos, and 'movement' may imply stretch or sporty fit, making it less close to the reference but still similar category.
Original Comfort Twill 5-pocket pants closely mirror chino style and fabric, fitting well with the reference product's style and construction.
These are stretch chinos, closely matching traditional chinos in style and silhouette; stretch is a minor variation but still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty | Movement Chino Pant (32" Inseam) | Size: 30
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Movement chino pants with matching inseam are highly relevantâ€”same pant type and function, though possibly stretch/athletic fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty | Coastline Stretch Chino (32" Inseam) | Size: 36
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above Coastline stretch chino with matching inseam; very similar to reference chino pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty | Movement Chino Pant (30" Inseam) | Size: 29
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly relevant chino pants similar to reference, small inseam difference irrelevant to core match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty | Movement Chino Pant (30" Inseam) | Size: 31
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above, very close in style and construction to reference chino pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty | Movement Chino Pant (32" Inseam) | Size: 36
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly comparable chino pant, similar inseam and construction to the reference, highly relevant.
Stretch terry fabric suggests more casual or athletic intention than traditional chinos, less aligned with reference.
5-pocket movement pant may be chino-like but likely more casual or with stretch, slightly less traditional than reference chinos.
